feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 09:16 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
